鹶鹶鹶

鹶字的基本解释

鹶
jīn
苦。
古同“矜”。

鹶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
［《集韻》居陵切，平蒸，見。］
(1)苦。
(2)自矜，妄自尊大。
(3)哀怜，怜悯。

鹶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹵字部】　鹶； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1507第06
【集韻】居陵切，音兢。【爾雅·釋言】滷鹶，鹹苦也。○按今《爾雅》作矜。註：可矜憐者，亦辛苦。　又【廣雅】鹶，哀也。

鹶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鹶字的起名意思

暂无。

Caterpillar
Basic explanation of words
Caterpillar
jīn
bitter.
Gu Tong "Jiang".
Caterpillar
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīn］
["Ji Yun" Ju Ling cut, steamed flat, see. ]
(1) Suffering.
(2) Self-respect, arrogant self-esteem.
(3) Pity, compassion.
Caterpillar
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 2】【halogen word department】　鹶; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 1507 page 06
[Jiyun] Ju tomb cut, sound trembling. 【Erya·Explanation】The brine bird is salty and bitter. ○According to today's "Er Ya", it will be used as a joke. Note: Those who can be pitiful are also hard.　[Guangya] again, sorrow too.
